channel.description: Maya Woodward's personal website and blog

item.title: Completing Advent of Code 2020 Day 1 in x86-64 Assembly
item.description: I think the Advent of Code challenges are a wonderful opportunity to experiment with new programming languages. As I have been trying to learn more about operating systems and the low level operations of computers, I thought it would be an interesting exercise to try to complete some of the Advent of Code 2020 challenges in x86-64 assembly on Linux.
